org.measure.platform.framework.config

Class LoggingConfiguration.LogbackLoggerContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • ContextAwareBase
      • org.measure.platform.framework.config.LoggingConfiguration.LogbackLoggerContextListener
  • Enclosing class:
    LoggingConfiguration

     class LoggingConfiguration.LogbackLoggerContextListener
extends ContextAwareBase
    Logback configuration is achieved by configuration file and API. When configuration file change is detected, the configuration is reset. This listener ensures that the programmatic configuration is also re-applied after reset.
